name: Cosmic Sorting Simulation - VR
description:
Cosmic Sorting Simulation is a simulated virtual reality experience orchestrated by two AI in space.

 

Made for the FreeRange PDX 2019 game jam in 3 days.

To see more of my work visit https://jonahdlovell.wixsite.com/jonahdlovell

-Credits-

Game by Jonah Lovell

Space station model by Dennis Haupt (https://www.artstation.com/artwork/xWLgO) with some alterations.
